schemas.name: query.graphql

merged.mergedContent:
# https://github.com/sdfr/my-app/blob/8dd42b1d09c31af813c9874280a516d097062342/server/data/schema/query.graphql:
type Query {
  getUser(id: String!): User
  testString: String
}

# https://github.com/sdfr/my-app/blob/8dd42b1d09c31af813c9874280a516d097062342/server/data/schema/user.graphql:
type User {
  _id: String
  displayName: String
  email: String
  firstName: String
  lastName: String
  birthday: String
  cars: [ Car ]
}

input InputUser {
  displayName: String!
  email: String!
  firstName: String!
  lastName: String!
  birthday: String!
}

# https://github.com/sdfr/my-app/blob/8dd42b1d09c31af813c9874280a516d097062342/server/data/schema/car.graphql:
type Car {
  _id: String
  model: String
  registrationNo: String
  owner: User
}

input InputCar {
  model: String!
  registrationNo: String!
  owner: String!
}

schemas.name: car.graphql
